data.title: pleasant surprise
data.text: we were passing through phoenix on a road trip and were looking for an inexpensive, clean place to stay.  We found this place on a last minute availability page and were pleasantly surprised.   The room was clean with a comfortable king bed.   Breakfast was included and was better than expected.   This place exceeded our expectations.

data.title: Really nice hotel
data.text: Very clean and modern. Great staff and spacious well appointed room. I will definitely stay here again.  Close to nice restaurants shops. Great free breakfast buffet with a great selection of food. Plenty of free parking.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to see you again! Thank you for the review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Another quality HIE property.
data.text:
I'm a platinum member and have stayed at many HIE properties, and this one ranks up there with my favorites.  Upon arriving I had the pleasure of meeting one of the managers, Andrea. She was super helpful from the start and during my three day stay. Even though the reason I came to Arizona was for events in Phoenix, I stayed here because the price was right and I figured it would be quieter then staying closer to Phoenix. 

Pros- super clean, great staff, clean pool and whirlpool. I noticed they also had security on duty, but it's a nice area so not sure why they had it. Plenty of well lit parking spaces. Bed was also super comfy.

Cons- water pressure in shower wasn't great, the shower head seemed a tad too high. I'm 5'7" and I struggled to change the setting. The water in sink never got cold, so when you brushed your teeth, it was warm.

I only had one issue with my room and it was fixed immediately, that being one of the lights in the bathroom was burned out and the exhaust fan was stuck.

Bottom line, great property and I would absolutely stay there again.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. I am also glad the staff were able to help out in the areas we had some problems. Andrea is awesome and I will pass along your comments to her!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: All we need at a reasonable price
data.text: We always stay here for Spring Training and for visiting family.  It has everything we want and at a reasonable price. The location, the accommodations, the price, and the free breakfast all add up to a very nice stay. In the beginning we tried other places, but this place is the best!

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review! We will see you next time.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice and New
data.text: My family and I (hubby and 2 kids) recently stayed at this Holiday Inn. It was new so of course the rooms and everything else inside was clean and fresh. The breakfast was excellent the ladies that take care of it do a great job keeping everything neat and tidy and stocked. Pool area was also nice and clean. Rooms were very spacious and beds were very comfortable. Will def be staying here again the next time we are in Surprise!!

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the great review! We can't wait to see you next time you are in the area!

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good but for the noisy AC
data.text: Nice room, nice bed and the overall hotel is clean and neat. The staff were friendly and helpful. Pool small but nice. Only complaint is that every time the compressor on the AC shut off it made a very loud clunking noise.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. I am sorry about the loud compressor noise. It takes a lot to cool down the Arizona heat and the units take a beating this time of year. I will make sure we get that unit checked out and running perfectly. Thank you for the review.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great hotel.
data.text: New, very clean, outstanding staff. Breakfast hot with healthy choices. Would highly recommend and stay there again. Convenient location with many restaurant choices very near. Close to many shopping  locations with shopping for all ages.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the great review! We are always happy to hear positive feedback.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Comfortable Stay
data.text:
We really like stay I g at the Holiday Inn's, usually get comfortable beds and have plenty good food to have for breakfast. They have hot or.cold foods along with fruits and breads of different kinds. Hot coffees, tea and cocoa is also available.
This one also had pancakes, some we've gone to had waffles.

Nice pool area and workout equipment, also has washer/dryer and each room has iron and board.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the review! The Pancake machine is pretty great. We are happy that you enjoyed your time with us.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean
data.text: Very nice stopover before heading to airport. Clean, comfortable., convenient. Great, pleasant front desk personnel. Typical breakfast bar. Airconditioner was struggling a bit but may have just been that one.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A really nice stay and a great value
data.text: The hotel was clean and comfortable.  Upon check in, my wife and I were greeted by a friendly staff member.  Our room was very nice and the house keeping staff was very courteous and attentive.  The complimentary breakfast was hot, fresh, and delicious.  The pool facility was clean and up to date.  For the price we paid, we received exceptional value.  I would gladly book the hotel again.  Great experience!

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
forrestb819,

Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am so happy to hear you had a good experience while at the hotel. If you are ever in the area come back and see us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place for long-term stay
data.text: My family and I stayed in one of the suites, which included 2 full beds, a sitting area, a kitchenette, large bathroom w/tub, for about 2 weeks and we were very comfortable and happy with our stay. The facility is well kept and our room was just great. Lots of nice amenities. Breakfast was served daily and that helped us get our day going without spending more $$. The staff was friendly and courteous. There are plenty of shopping and eateries nearby the hotel, however, if you need to be closer to other cities, like Phoenix, I'd say pick another HIE because the drive will be over 30 min. Overall, my family and I were very satisfied with our stay.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Left X,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for our hotel. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope if you are ever back in sunny Surprise you will come see us again.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome Hotel for Spring Training Baseball
data.text:
My husband and our two sons recently stayed at this hotel. We enjoyed it and will be back. If you love baseball (especially the Royals and Rangers) then this is a great place to stay. Within walking distance of the training fields. It was so nice to be able to go over there for awhile and then come back and rest. This hotel is very clean.  You always see people cleaning it and taking pride in the hotel. The staff was very friendly. My kids enjoyed the heated pool and I liked the hot tub. 
    The breakfast that is complimentary for guests was very adequate for my family. Had some healthier options and also had the great cinnnamon rolls every day. I also purchased some food out of the little store in the lobby and did not think the prices were bad at all. 
    My family also went to Sonoma one day and the Grand Canyon one day. The hotel was close to the 303 highway which made it easier to get to these locations. Within a mile from the hotel there were lots of restaurants and shops. There is a Walmart there that we got drinks and snacks at. Our room had a refrigerator and microwave and so that made it a little cheaper.  
   We also went to a game in Goodyear, and it was only a 20 min drive. So this hotel is not to far from other attractions. We would stay here again.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
KC2833,

Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review of our hotel. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good option in new area of Northwest Phoenix
data.text:
I visited this hotel while on business in Wickenburg, 45 minutes away, which in this remote corner of greater Phoenix is considered "close".

I was genuinely "surprised" by the amenities and high quality of the hotel, which is fairly new.  The reception area is very nice and the desk persons were great.  The room was clean, comfortable and quiet.

The hotel is situated in a relatively newly developed area with many great restaurants and shopping.  It is also near the City Hall and sports venues.  

The cost met my limitations and I could not be happier with the quality.

I plan to stay here again on future trips to the area.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
I am so happy we "surprised" you with our hotel. We take great pride in giving every guest a great stay. Thank you for the review!

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great location for baseball spring training atmosphere
data.text: tied for best location (with residence inn) for those who want to absorb the baseball atmosphere. walking to morning practice, then back to hotel, then back to game is very easy. the pool & hot tub are nice perks on top of the free breakfast & wifi.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Pat R. 

Thank you for taking the time to give us a wonderful review. I am happy you enjoyed your time with us.

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Perfect Location to stay if you're catching a spring Royals Game
data.text:
Nice and new and in a perfect location if you are headed down for a spring training Royals or Rangers game. Within a 2 block walk.  The rooms are good sized and quiet as well.  The pillows are FLAT so if you are used to fluffy pillows you will need more than one. Our room was street side and we didn't hear traffic at all. 

A nice size bathroom with extra shelves below the sink for storing toiletries bags and other beauty needs.  

There isn't a safe in the room so if you need to lock up items you won't have an option.

Breakfast is included and they have a nice selection of the typical eggs, pancakes, fruit etc. 

The staff are all super friendly.  Lots of parking.  They have a small outside pool. 

I would absolutely stay here again.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
kwhite5685,

Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review. I am sorry that your pillows were flat! I will make sure that housekeeping focuses on making sure all pillows are fluffy and comfortable. We also have safe deposit boxes at the front desk for our guests to use. We hope to see you again!

Ian
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average place with Above Average Staff!
data.text: We stayed here for one night and the hotel was just as you imagine a Holiday Inn to be.  Clean, average, decent.  Our room was nice but next to the exit so there was a bit of exit slamming of the door going on.   What made this above average is the staff.  We were greeted very nicely and the morning breakfast people were great - they have a very nice spread included in the price which is a plus.  After we left and returned to CA , our 7 year old discovered his beloved stuffed animal was left behind.  We immediately called the hotel and they started to look.  Though the night shift turned up nothing as she was alone and couldn't leave the desk she left notes for the next day shift.  I called first thing in the morning, they stated they saw the note and asked if she could call right back.  Within 20 minutes, we had confirmation that the stuffed animal was found and I commend them for taking this as seriously as we did (our boy cried himself to sleep that night).  Needless to say, KUDOS to this honorable and kind staff.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give our hotel a great review. We are so pleased we were able to reunite your son with his stuffed animal. I will make sure that the staff hears your kind words.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A very pleasant stay overall
data.text:
Hats off to the personnel at this IHG property. Everyone was friendly and courteous. I asked for an early check-in expecting the usual 'we're sorry' and instead was told to come on in, my room was ready. After a 4 hour flight, it was like winning a prize. 

This property is very well maintained for a seven or eight year old property. We had a room on the 4th floor with a nice view. The room was very clean as was the bathroom. The outside of the property was clean and the grounds are well kept. There was plenty of parking as well. 

The breakfast buffet was the usual stuff as expected. The ladies working in the dining room kept the area clean and the trays full. 

My only complaint, if I can call it that, was that the 'do not disturb' hanger was removed from my door where I placed it before leaving for the day and housekeeping serviced the room. My stay was for two nights and I was only there to sleep so I didn't see the need for my room to be serviced.  There wasn't a safe in the room so when I left the next morning I had to take my valuables with me since the do not disturb hanger was gone and my room would undoubtedly be serviced again. 

Other than that, the towels were old, not soft at all. Our room had a queen and a king bed, no sofa bed, a microwave, mini fridge, iron and hairdryer. Good room for families.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello,

I am sorry there was a mix up with the do not disturb sign and that you received some older towels! We try and keep an eye out for towels that are worn and no longer soft and must have missed yours. Thank you for the review I hope you enjoyed your two days with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Paper thin walls to listen to people fart & fight !
data.text:
Very noisy due to poor construction. Shower water not hot. When complained...no one cares.
Manager suspected my motive in complaining. What a nerve. At over $100. Night I'm suspected of lying?
WOW! Will never stay at this brand again. Definatly way over priced.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Susan G,

Thank you for writing a review on our hotel. Our goal is to deliver exceptional service and comfortable accommodations. However, we sincerely apologize that your stay was negatively by the noise challenges and the type of service received did not live up to your expectations. It is certainly not our intent to disappoint our valued guests like you, but to instead provide good value, comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations. We have shared your comments with the hotel management and we’re confident that necessary actions will be made, in order to avoid the same situations in the future.

Thank you for your feedback and we hope that you would consider staying with us again in order to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

Sincerely,

Grace P.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A favorite Holiday Inn Express
data.text: We really like the property.   Rooms are always clean and comfortable, with well lit rooms and good rates.  Yesenia booked our 4 night stay.  Very friendly and professional young lady.   We also liked Erma, in the breakfast room.   She worked very hard to keep the room clean and well stocked with food.   She went beyond normal service, by taking our dirty plates, to allow us more room.   She always greeted us with a smile.  In fact, all the employees are very helpful and friendly..  This is a very nice place.  We have stayed here many times and plan to return.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I will make sure Yesenia and Erma see your very kind words. Thank you for taking the time to recognize them they deserve it! I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice place
data.text:
We stayed here in December while visiting our son.  The positives were that the room and hotel were very clean. The staff was very friendly. The bed was really comfortable, although could use new pillows. The breakfast was very nice. Had everything you need to get the day started. There was always coffee in the lobby any time of the day. The hotel location was good.  Set off the main roads, but very close to all shopping and restaurants. The draw for this hotel must be the baseball stadium next to it. 
   The cons were minimal.  The room was a little on the small side, ther was no room safe, and my biggest complaint, which spreads across the entire chain is that they charge an extra $10 per person, per day for anyone over ONE person in the room. I've had this also happen in ocean city MD, in a Holiday Inn and suites.  The room we stayed in sleeps 6 but were charged extra after the 3rd person. When booking, on the phone, with a person, I was not told about this charge. I noticed it when I thought the total was a little high after I had already booked the room. For this reason, I probably will not stay here again unless I have club points to use up. But if you don't mind this extra charge, or know a way around it, I think this is a nice hotel.

owner_response.author: Ian G, General Manager at Holiday Inn Express Surprise, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello,

Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel We appreciate the feedback. I will have to investigate the extra person charge. I am sorry for the confusion and hope you will give us another chance to improve your opinion of us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
